name: Fusion Alpha Build v0.3
description:
Third test build for fusion.

1. Automatic save and load system has been implemented. So when a level is completed, it unlocks another level and it is saved.

2. Survival mode is now available!!

3. New platformer level added.

4. A lot of other minor improvements have been made.

The development of this game is getting paused for now. This is because, it's a small project I just decided to work on so as to take a break from my main project. 

So now I'll be resuming my main project fully. 

If lots of positive feedback is gotten from this, I'll look forward to completing it then. 

Thanks!!!
